de.cost: €29.99/month for Sky Ticket Sport, €14.99/month for DAZN
de.additionalInfo: Sky Deutschland holds rights to most matches, DAZN broadcasts Friday and select Sunday matches.

us.additionalInfo: ESPN+ holds exclusive rights to all Bundesliga matches in the United States.

gb.additionalInfo: Sky Sports broadcasts select Bundesliga matches in the UK.

ca.additionalInfo: DAZN holds exclusive rights to all Bundesliga matches in Canada.

au.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds rights to Bundesliga matches in Australia.

in.additionalInfo: Sony LIV streams Bundesliga matches in India.

nl.additionalInfo: Viaplay holds rights to Bundesliga matches in the Netherlands.

pl.additionalInfo: Viaplay holds rights to Bundesliga matches in Poland.

jp.additionalInfo: SKY PerfecTV! broadcasts Bundesliga matches in Japan.

br.additionalInfo: OneFootball streams Bundesliga matches for free in Brazil.

mx.additionalInfo: Sky Sports holds rights to Bundesliga matches in Mexico.

kr.additionalInfo: SPOTV holds rights to broadcast Bundesliga matches in South Korea.

mena.additionalInfo: beIN Sports holds rights to Bundesliga matches across the Middle East and North Africa region.

es.additionalInfo: Movistar+ has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Spain in recent years, but current details may vary.

fr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to Bundesliga matches in France in recent years, but current details may vary.

it.additionalInfo: Sky Italia has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Italy in recent years, but current details may vary.

ru.additionalInfo: Match TV has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Russia in recent years, but current details may vary.

cn.additionalInfo: PP Sports has held rights to Bundesliga matches in China in recent years, but current details may vary.

sg.additionalInfo: StarHub has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Singapore in recent years, but current details may vary.

tr.additionalInfo: beIN Sports has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Turkey in recent years, but current details may vary.

ph.additionalInfo: Cignal TV has held rights to Bundesliga matches in the Philippines in recent years, but current details may vary.

ae.additionalInfo: beIN Sports covers Bundesliga matches in the UAE as part of its MENA region coverage.

za.additionalInfo: SuperSport has held rights to Bundesliga matches in South Africa in recent years, but current details may vary.

th.additionalInfo: PPTV has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Thailand in recent years, but current details may vary.

eg.additionalInfo: beIN Sports covers Bundesliga matches in Egypt as part of its MENA region coverage.

se.additionalInfo: Viaplay has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Sweden in recent years, but current details may vary.

no.additionalInfo: Viaplay has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Norway in recent years, but current details may vary.

dk.additionalInfo: Viaplay has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Denmark in recent years, but current details may vary.

gr.additionalInfo: Cosmote TV has held rights to Bundesliga matches in Greece in recent years, but current details may vary.
